name: THE WORLD WAS BORING...
description:
A #BitsySecretSanta2018 game for Rose

Check out Rose on twitter @modernmodron or on mozz.itch.io

The three prompts were: 

ACCIDENTAL
BEWILDERING
NEW

This is my first completed Bitsy game, and I'm really happy with how it came out.

Please please PLEASE leave me a comment, because I crave positive reinforcement.
